bug.summary: TensorBoard KFP viz doesn't appear to work properly with KF 1 installation
bug.description:
/kind bug With kf 1 rc4. Not sure if this should be filed under the kf or kfp repo. The TB KFP viz (as documented <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/pipelines/sdk/output-viewer/#tensorboard>here</denchmark-link> ) appears to no longer work properly on a KF install, but work on a hosted kfp installation, running the same pipeline step. This used to work on KF 0.7.1, IIRC. On the KF installation, I see the following. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/115093/75122491-c7589600-5652-11ea-986c-c2146f2ada11.png></denchmark-link>
The given log directory is definitely populated with the correct stuff. If I run the on hosted kfp, the result is as expected, e.g. as below. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/115093/75122509-f40cad80-5652-11ea-84d4-fb7fd4b4558a.png></denchmark-link>
Haven't dug in further yet.
